column1: # Data Collection Guide - Toast POS Integration
*Document every item currently in your Toast POS system*
# Data Collection Guide - Delivery Platform Integration
*All items sold to consumers need nutritional information*
1. **Toast Integration**: Export current menu from Toast system
2. **Delivery Platforms**: Gather menu data from each platform
3. **Nutritional Data**: Collect from suppliers or calculate from recipes
4. **Allergen Info**: Critical for food safety - verify all sources
5. **Cross-reference**: Ensure all items match between systems
